articles.title: Sudan army battles rebel assault on HQ, fighting thwarts evacuations - Reuters
articles.description: Sudanese troops battled waves of attacks on Wednesday by a paramilitary force trying to seize the army's headquarters, while the failure of a U.S.-brokered ceasefire hampered efforts to <a href="/world/africa/germany-forced-halt-evacuation-mission-sudan-spieg…
articles.content: KHARTOUM, April 19 (Reuters) - Sudanese troops battled waves of attacks on Wednesday by a paramilitary force trying to seize the army's headquarters, while the failure of a U.S.-brokered ceasefire ha… [+5195 chars]
